Class HotelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Managers.HotelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventLib.HotelEventListener, java.util.Observer

    public class HotelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventLib.HotelEventListener, java.util.Observer
    The HotelManager controls the hotel based on received events.
